page.title: 14LAW AND ORDER-CAMELS'AREA
page.content: There is no police station in our area but the local policeman is based in Marston Magna. There is very little crime but there are breakins in to shops and garges at fairly regular intervals.The police are called to road accidents quite frequently but they are seldom within the area,though the police cars travel along the A359 and A303. The local policeman covers a wide area and can be called to other areas,miles away to help in troubles.This year he went to Stonehenge to help prevent an invasion of people there on Midsummers day The policeman is called out to deal with drunkeness,which is not a criminal offence. The policeman relies on a central computer in London for information.
